name: Netvibes: soft customization
description:
Works best with Netvibes style named "Fresh".

Changes:
- No notification box (which was displayed all the time)
- Round tabs
- Small margins to maximize space for text (for tabs and modules)
- Round modules
- Hidden unread news in the tabs
- Bottom border (2px) to the tabs on rollover
